Title: Requires license plates for certain bicycles with electric assist and electric scooters
Summary: Requires the registration and issuance of license plates for bicycles with electric assist and electric scooters that can exceed twenty-eight miles per hour with battery assistance up to and exceeding seven hundred fifty watts.
LawCode: Amd ยง1242, add ยง1290, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to requiring license plates for certain bicycles with electric assist and electric scooters
